H0.text: Electromagnetic waves are the type of waves that travel at the speed of light, as proved by Hertz.

H1.text: Sound is the type of waves that Hertz proved travel at the speed of light.

H2.text: Seismic waves are the type of waves that travel at the speed of light, as proved by Hertz.

H3.text: Tsunamis are the type of waves that Hertz proved travel at the speed of light.

A4.text: Hertz measured Maxwell's waves and demonstrated that the velocity of these waves was equal to the velocity of light.

A5.text: These experiments established that light and these waves were both a form of electromagnetic radiation obeying the Maxwell equations.
